Analysis project initiation

Source: R/kobo_projectinit.R
kobo_projectinit.Rd

Create analysis project structure

kobo_projectinit()

Value

A structure of directory and scripts in order to set up quickly a project.

Examples

kobo_projectinit()
#> Let's create various standard folders and copy some analysis script
#> Perso exists in mainDir and is a directory.
#> Code exists in mainDir and is a directory.
#> You have multiple library path! 
#> shiny_app exists in subDir and is a directory.
#> www exists in subDir and is a directory.
#> css exists in subDir and is a directory.
#> fonts exists in subDir and is a directory.
#> image exists in subDir and is a directory.
#> Data exists in mainDir and is a directory.
#> Out directory exists in your project directory and is a directory.
#> bar_multi directory exists in out directory and is a directory.
#> disagg_multi directory exists in out directory and is a directory.
#> bar_one directory exists in out directory and is a directory.
#> disagg_one directory exists in out directory and is a directory.
#> Please open now the file called 0-config.R within the ++code++ folder and configure the path to the form and the dataset. 
#>
